question: Who is set to become the first female pilot of the Indian Navy?
explanation: Lieutenant Shivangi will join naval operations upon completion of operational training on December 2, 2019. Shivangi will graduate to become the first female pilot of the Indian Navy. Prior to this, Aviation branch of Indian Navy had women officers only operating as air traffic control (ATC) officers and as observers in the aircraft who are responsible for communication and weapons. She hails from Muzzafarpur in Bihar and completed her schooling from DAV Public school in Muzzafarpur.
